name: PAC MAN- The CHOMPion's Back!
description:
PAC-MAN is a 1982 action maze video game. The goal is to move Pac-Man around the maze-like screen to consume lines of dots and avoiding or attacking one of four hunting ghosts. Four power pellets are available in the corners of each level, and if Pac-Man can gobble one of those, the ghosts all get disabled and can be eaten by Pac-Man. The game ends when Pac-Man has lost all of his lives.

PAC-MAN the CHOMPion's Back is a remake of the original Atari game in our vision.

GAME OVERVIEW:

  • The player’s main objective is to collect all the pills and avoid or kill the ghosts. The player will require to collect the power before attacking the ghost or the player will die when they encounter the ghost. 
KEEP IN MIND:
  • The player needs to collect all the pills and avoid or kill the enemy ghosts. The chase to avoid or to counterattack the ghost builds pressure on the player, making the gameplay more exciting. 
Controls

WASD – Move (E – Dash)  

Arrow keys – Move (Space – Dash)
